name: ato
info: Data Model needed for ATO use case

enums.name: RangeType
enums.info: List defining range types for segment profile

enums.name: VoltageType
enums.info: List defining Voltage types for segment profile

enumLiterals.name: vtNotFitted
enumLiterals.info: Line not fitted (not electrified) with any traction system

enums.name: TunnelType
enums.info: List defining tunnel types for segment profile

enums.name: CurveRadius
enums.info: List defining different curve radii for segment profile

enumLiterals.name: trainFront
enumLiterals.info: No train length delay on validity end point of profile element

enumLiterals.name: trainBack
enumLiterals.info: Train length delay on validity end point of profile element.

structs.name: TimingPointMapping
structs.info: main Use-Case map from infra (timetable) to ato (journeyProfile)

structs.name: ATOArea
structs.info: Defines ATO Area with collection of ATO segments

structs.name: ATOSegment
structs.info: Defines the topology reference information for a segment profile.

attrs.name: sameDir
attrs.info: true: same as TrackEdge direction, false: reverse to TrackEdge direction

attrs.name: trackSection
attrs.info: refers to the track edge section within a track edge.

structs.name: SegmentProfile
structs.info: Defines a segment profile for ATO

attrs.name: length
attrs.info: the defined range corresponds to the constraints from SS126

attrs.name: utcOffset
attrs.info: UTC time offset in minutes ; Resolution as defined in SS126 is 15 mins

attrs.name: startAltitude
attrs.info: Altitude at the beginning of the SP. Considering ETRS89 as reference. The defined range corresponds to constraints from SS126

attrs.name: atotsContactInfoDir
attrs.info: true if contact info exists fornominal direction ; false if contact info exists for reverse direction ; undefined if no contact info exists

structs.name: AtoTSContactInfo
structs.info: Defines the ATO-TS contact information for a segment profile

structs.name: StaticSpeedProfileStart
structs.info: Defines the static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicable speed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

structs.name: SpecificStaticSpeedProfileStart
structs.info: Defines the specific static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicablespeed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: specificStaticSpeedProfileType
attrs.info: value indicating the type of specific static speed profile.

attrs.name: otherSpecificStaticSpeedProfileCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable other specific static speed profile category applicable for SSP

attrs.name: cantDeficiencyCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable cant deficiency category applicable for SSP.

structs.name: StaticSpeedProfileChange
structs.info: Defines the static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicable speed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

structs.name: SpecificStaticSpeedProfileChange
structs.info: Defines the specific static speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicablespeed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: specificStaticSpeedProfileType
attrs.info: value indicating the type of specific static speed profile.

attrs.name: otherSpecificStaticSpeedProfileCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable other specific static speed profile category applicable for SSP

attrs.name: cantDeficiencyCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable cant deficiency category applicable for SSP.

structs.name: AxleLoadSpeedProfile
structs.info: Defines the axle load speed profile for a section of track

attrs.name: speed
attrs.info: Defines the applicablespeed for the section of track ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 5 km/h

attrs.name: trainEndApplicability
attrs.info: Indicates if a speed limit given for a profile element is to be applied until the front of the train (no train length delay) or the end of the train (train length delay) has left the element.

attrs.name: axleLoadCategory
attrs.info: value indicating the suitable Axle load category.

structs.name: GradientStart
structs.info: Defines the gradient at the start of segment profile

attrs.name: uphillGradient
attrs.info: false if the gradient has downhill direction

structs.name: GradientChange
structs.info: Defines the gradient at a given location in segment profile

attrs.name: uphillGradient
attrs.info: false if the gradient has downhill direction

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

structs.name: CurveStart
structs.info: Defines the curve at the start of segment profile

structs.name: CurveChange
structs.info: Defines the curve at a given location in segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

structs.name: TimingPoint
structs.info: Defines a fixed point on the infrastructure

attrs.name: name
attrs.info: User-friendly name. Empty string, if equal to the id

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: stopLocationTolerance
attrs.info: Defines the required stopping tolerance for a Timing Point

attrs.name: stoppingPointReachDistance
attrs.info: Defines the distance from a stopping point to consider it as reached

structs.name: BaliseGroup
structs.info: Defines a technical device group on the railway trackbed

attrs.name: balises
attrs.info: Defines the balises within the balise group

attrs.name: nidCQualifier
attrs.info: true if same NID_C as in segment profile is to be used; false if new country id is to be used for the balise

attrs.name: nidC
attrs.info: to be defined when countyIdQualifier is false ; defines the new NID_C for the balise group

structs.name: Balise
structs.info: Defines a technical device on the railway trackbed

attrs.name: positionInGroup
attrs.info: Defines the position of a balise in a balise group

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

structs.name: PermittedBrakingDistance
structs.info: Defines the permitted braking distance information for a segment profile

attrs.name: byEmergencyBrake
attrs.info: true if Braking is to be achieved using Emergency brake ; false if braking is to be achieved by service brake

attrs.name: uphillGradient
attrs.info: false if the gradient has downhill direction

structs.name: VoltageStart
structs.info: Defines the power voltage information for a segment profile

structs.name: VoltageChange
structs.info: Defines the power voltage information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

structs.name: CurrentStart
structs.info: Defines the current limitation information for a segment profile

attrs.name: current
attrs.info: Defined current limitation in Ampere ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 10A

structs.name: CurrentChange
structs.info: Defines the current limitation information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pos
attrs.info: Position on the associated segment profile

attrs.name: current
attrs.info: Defined current limitation in Ampere ; Resolution as defined in SS126 = 10A

structs.name: Tunnel
structs.info: Defines the tunnel information for a segment profile

structs.name: UnprotectedLX
structs.info: Defines the unprotected LX information for a segment profile

attrs.name: pNominal
attrs.info: Position on the segment profile associated for nominal direction of Segment profile

attrs.name: pReverse
attrs.info: Position on the segment profile associated for reverse direction of Segment profile

structs.name: LimitedDynamicBrakeForce
structs.info: Defines the limited dynamic brake force information for a segment profile

attrs.name: dynamicBrakeForceLimit
attrs.info: the defined range corresponds to the constraints from SS126

structs.name: SegmentSection
structs.info: Defines sections with start and end references for use in segment profile

attrs.name: pStart
attrs.info: Start Position on the segment profile

attrs.name: pEnd
attrs.info: End Position on the segment profile
